meanings.definition: To have a strong craving or desire for something.
meanings.sent1: After seeing the delicious cake, I was jonesing for a slice.
meanings.sent2: She was jonesing for a vacation after a long week of work.
meanings.sent3: I'm jonesing for some popcorn at the movies tonight.
meanings.sent4: His sweet tooth was jonesing for some candy all day.
meanings.sent5: The kids were jonesing for ice cream on a hot summer day.

meanings.definition: To feel withdrawal symptoms from a drug or substance.
meanings.sent1: He started jonesing for cigarettes after quitting smoking.
meanings.sent2: She was jonesing for caffeine after skipping her morning coffee.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be jonesing for catnip after playing with it.
meanings.sent4: The patient was jonesing for painkillers after the surgery.
meanings.sent5: The addict was jonesing for their next fix.
